sentences.en: Could Google break Wall Street's equity underwriting cartel?
sentences.cn: Google能否破除华尔街的证券承销同业联盟?

sentences.en: Fractious infighting left the cartel in disarray. Prices collapsed.
sentences.cn: 混战之后油价崩溃,欧佩克陷入困境.

sentences.en: In general side - payments must be made between cartel members in order to induce to these objectives.
sentences.cn: 总的说来,卡特尔成员之间必须作出侧向支付以促使大家遵守这些目标.

sentences.en: In the past, non - OPEC firms would have more than compensated for the cartel's reticence to invest.
sentences.cn: 要是在过去,面对欧佩克产能的停滞不前, 非 欧佩克公司一定能大肆扩张,获利丰厚.

sentences.en: Industry group is the advanced configuration of cartel.
sentences.cn: 企业集团是企业联合的高级形态.

sentences.en: Internet cafes have questioned the public is engaged in price - fixing cartel.
sentences.cn: 有市民质疑网吧是在搞价格联盟.

sentences.en: It is clear that all the current bank charges, is the obvious price cartel.
sentences.cn: 显然,目前各个银行的收费行为, 就是明显的价格卡特尔.

sentences.en: Looking for Cartel Clothing ? Find exactly what you want today. Search for Cartel Clothing.
sentences.cn: 寻找卡帝乐服装 吗 ?恰好找到您今天想要的. 挑选卡帝乐服装吧.

sentences.en: Police detained five illegal ( alleged ) cartel gunmen in the raid.
sentences.cn: 在搜捕中,警察捕获了五名疑为贩毒集团成员的持枪歹徒.

sentences.en: Some Gurista and Angel Cartel NPCs had incorrect stats, such as damage, resistance and speeds.
sentences.cn: 一些古斯塔斯和天使联合企业NPC的 属性数值有错误, 例如:伤害 、 抗性、速度等.

sentences.en: The cartel that is optimal for its members is not optimal for the world, of course.
sentences.cn: 诚然,对其成员国来说是最优的卡特尔,对世界来说未必是最优的.

sentences.en: The comments come as members of oil cartel Opec decide on output levels.
sentences.cn: 这些信息有助于油联盟欧佩克成员国决定产油水平.

sentences.en: The usual analysis has correctly pointed to pressures that tend to make cartel power erode.
sentences.cn: 通常的分析曾正确地指出了使卡特尔的力量受到削弱的种种压力.

sentences.en: We think the authorities should see whether there is a cartel in the iron ore market.
sentences.cn: 我们认为,当局应该调查一下,铁矿石市场上是否存在卡特尔组织.

sentences.en: Witness the tensions that dog OPEC , the cartel of oil - producing countries.
sentences.cn: 连石油生产国联盟OPEC都 各自为政, 弓拔弩张.

words.tran_cn: 卡特尔；企业联合；垄断联盟；俘虏交换条约

trans.tran_en: a group of people or companies who agree to sell something at a particular price in order to prevent competition and increase profits
